title: 34. "All for You"- It's Okay to Receive All the Good that Comes Your Way
description:
In this episode, we talk about how in this giving season, it's important to remember that just as it's important that we give, it's also important to remember to receive all the good that comes our way. Sometimes we feel as though we are undeserving of good things or we may feel overwhelmed by the idea of receiving but today, I am going to help walk you through why and how we should receive the good in our lives with open arms.

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
